snippet: Noreen Harrington, a chief officer for a hedge fund owned in part by Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz, said she shared her concerns about Bernard L. Madoff’s investment performance with her superiors.
abstract: Noreen Harrington, a chief officer for a hedge fund owned in part by New York Mets owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz, says she shared her concerns about Bernard L Madoff’s investment performance with her superiors; the men have been accused of improperly benefiting from their relationship with Madoff over years of investing with him, and of ignoring evidence he might have been engaged in wrongdoing.
lead_paragraph: Noreen Harrington, a chief officer for a hedge fund owned in part by Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz, said she shared her concerns about Bernard L. Madoff’s investment performance with her superiors.

headline.seo: Noreen Harrington Says She Alerted Mets Owners of Concerns With Madoff Investments
headline.main: A Court Filing Says a Mets Owner Knew of Madoff Concerns
headline.print_headline: A Court Filing Says A Mets Owner Knew Of Madoff Concerns
